import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Button, Form } from 'react-bootstrap'; function StatisticsScreen() { const [metric, setMetric] = useState('highestSold'); return ( <>
setMetric('highestSold')} checked={metric === 'highestSold'} /> setMetric('highestSoldCustom')} checked={metric === 'highestSoldCustom'} /> setMetric('topTenCustom')} checked={metric === 'topTenCustom'} /> setMetric('zip')} checked={metric === 'zip'} /> setMetric('aveSell')} checked={metric === 'avgSell'} /> Start Date End Date
) } export default StatisticsScreen;
